text: what services does poorna multi speciality hospital provide as a multi speciality hospital poorna multi speciality hospital is a comprehensive multi speciality healthcare institution offering preventive diagnostic curative surgical and rehabilitative services the hospital integrates outpatient care inpatient services emergency medicine intensive care advanced diagnostics and specialty clinics under one roof key specialties include cardiology neurology orthopedics gynecology pediatrics general medicine general surgery oncology support nephrology pulmonology ent dermatology and endocrinology the hospital follows evidencebased clinical protocols patientcentered care models
and multidisciplinary treatment planning to ensure quality outcomes

what is the complete admission process for inpatients the inpatient admission process at poorna multi speciality hospital begins with a doctors recommendation or emergency triage decision patients or attendants must complete registration at the admissions counter by submitting valid id proof insurance details if applicable and prior medical records a bed is allocated based on availability and clinical requirement general ward semiprivate private icu consent forms financial counseling and advance estimates are explained before admission emergency admissions bypass routine formalities
initially which are completed once the patient is stabilized

how is hospital billing calculated and explained to patients billing at poorna multi speciality hospital is transparent and itemized charges include consultation fees bed charges nursing care procedures investigations medicines consumables and professional fees for planned procedures an approximate cost estimate is shared in advance final billing may vary based on length of stay complications or additional interventions patients receive interim bills for long stays and a detailed discharge summary with a final bill billing counselors are available to clarify
any charges

how does the emergency department function 247 the emergency department at poorna multi speciality hospital operates 247 with trained emergency physicians nurses and rapidresponse teams patients are triaged based on severity using standardized triage protocols lifethreatening cases receive immediate attention emergency services include trauma care cardiac emergencies stroke management poisoning acute infections and respiratory distress oncall specialists imaging laboratory services blood bank and operating theatres are available round the clock

what types of icu facilities are available poorna multi speciality hospital has wellequipped intensive care units including medical icu surgical icu and high dependency units hdu each icu is managed by trained intensivists and critical care nurses with continuous patient monitoring facilities include ventilators invasive monitoring infusion pumps dialysis support and infectioncontrolled environments family communication is structured and daily updates are provided by the treating team

what cardiac services are offered at the hospital the cardiology department at poorna multi speciality hospital provides evaluation and management of heartrelated conditions including hypertension coronary artery disease heart failure and arrhythmias services include ecg 2d echocardiography treadmill testing holter monitoring and medical management patients receive lifestyle counseling medication optimization and longterm followup plans to prevent disease progression

how are stroke and neurological emergencies managed neurological emergencies such as stroke seizures and acute weakness are managed under emergency stroke protocols rapid imaging neurological assessment and stabilization are prioritized the neurology team coordinates with icu physiotherapy and rehabilitation services to optimize recovery and reduce disability

what orthopedic treatments and surgeries are available the orthopedics department at poorna multi speciality hospital treats fractures arthritis sports injuries spine disorders and joint degeneration management includes conservative therapy physiotherapy minimally invasive procedures and surgical interventions postoperative rehabilitation and mobility training are integral parts of orthopedic care

what womens health services are provided gynecology services include menstrual disorder management pregnancy care infertility evaluation menopause counseling and gynecological surgeries the department follows patient privacy informed consent and personalized care throughout diagnosis and treatment

how does the hospital care for children and newborns the pediatrics department provides comprehensive care for infants children and adolescents services include growth monitoring vaccination treatment of infections and chronic disease management childfriendly environments and parental counseling ensure holistic pediatric care

how are laboratory tests conducted and reported laboratory services at poorna multi speciality hospital follow strict quality control and biosafety standards samples are collected by trained technicians and processed using calibrated equipment reports are reviewed by qualified pathologists and made available digitally or in print within defined turnaround times

what imaging facilities are available the radiology department offers xray ultrasound ct scan and other imaging services radiological investigations are interpreted by experienced radiologists and shared with treating physicians for accurate diagnosis and treatment planning

what rights do patients have during treatment patients at poorna multi speciality hospital have the right to respectful care informed consent privacy confidentiality and clear information regarding diagnosis and treatment patients can ask questions seek second opinions and access their medical records the hospital ensures ethical medical practices and grievance redressal mechanisms

what allied health and support services are available support services include physiotherapy dietetics psychological counseling pharmacy and social work these services work collaboratively with doctors to enhance recovery nutrition mental wellbeing and postdischarge planning

what is included in the discharge process the discharge process includes a medical summary medication instructions followup schedule dietary advice and warning signs patients receive counseling on home care and medication adherence discharge is finalized only after clinical clearance and billing settlement

how does telemedicine support followup care telemedicine at poorna multi speciality hospital enables patients to consult doctors remotely for followups report reviews and medication adjustments it improves continuity of care especially for elderly patients and those living far from the hospital
